## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Aws = Pulumi.Aws;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Aws.Qldb.GetLedger.InvokeAsync(new Aws.Qldb.GetLedgerArgs
        {
            Name = "an_example_ledger",
        }));
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v3/go/aws/qldb"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := qldb.LookupLedger(ctx, &qldb.LookupLedgerArgs{
			Name: "an_example_ledger",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example python %}}
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_aws as aws

example = aws.qldb.get_ledger(name="an_example_ledger")
```

{{% /example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = pulumi.output(aws.qldb.getLedger({
    name: "an_example_ledger",
}, { async: true }));
```
